name: ProjectFlux 7DRL
description:
This is my 7DRL_2021 entry. Feel free to give any feedback in the comments or find me on discord as AxeForge#0707!

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • To attack just simple attempt to move into a monster
  • NumKeys 1-7 to equip a weapon in that inventory slot (from left to right)
  • Use the left mouse button to interact with the craft buttons.
  • Press ESC at anytime to exit

How To Play:

  • Defeat the monsters on each floor. When you defeat all the monsters on a floor, the exit to the next floor will be open but you may need to run around a bit to find it.
  • Make sure you consider your choices carefully, both crafting and equipping items take a turn!
  • The goal of the game is to get to the last floor to make it out of the dungeon alive!
  • Use the craft buttons to craft an item to survive against the monsters

Here's what the items do and how to craft them:

  • All Axes: Have a chance to critically strike. Each axe requires at least 1 of each kind of ore (red, yellow, blue and green)
  • FireAxe == deals damage based on max health requires 1 additional red ore
  • WaterAxe == does another attack for less damage (can crit) requires 1 additional blue ore
  • WindAxe == has a chance to do another attack for full damage (can crit) requires 1 additional green ore
  • EarthAxe == each attack ignores enemy defenses and requires 1 additional yellow ore

Known Bugs:

  • - Currently the game may sometimes crash. It seems to happen when going to the next floor.
